name: Teddy's happy picnic
description:
Teddy is a bear who lived in the forest.

He like to picnic, and today he want to have a good picnic.

And maybe make some new friends, that's depending on you.

Eating various food, try to adjust everyone's belongings, and explore all uses of all items are all the things you can do.

Wait a second.

But you don't really believe that aren't you?

That lunatic and his pet is testing something unreasonable.

QW5kIHlvdT8gWW91IHdpbGwgZXhwbG9yZSBldmVuIG1vcmUgdGhpbmdzLCBob3cgYWJvdXQgbWVzc2VkIHVwIHNvbWVib2R5J3MgaGVhZD8KCkFuZCBob3cgYWJvdXQganVzdCBtYWtlIHRoZSAid29ybGQiIGEgbWVzcz8KCldoYXRldmVyLCBqdXN0IGtlZXAgaW4gbWluZC4=

DON'T FAIL ME DOWN.

Warning:This game contains flashing light, harsh sound and swearing.
